## strip() function

Correct the given number to specifying significant digits.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function strip(num: NumberType, precision?: number): number;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type       | Description                                                         |
| --------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| num       | NumberType | The input number                                                    |
| precision | number     | _(Optional)_ An integer specifying the number of significant digits |

**Returns:**

number

## Example

strip(0.09999999999999998) === 0.1 // true
